It was this very fixture that opened the WSL season last year with an attendance of just over 2,000 on a Friday night under the Sky Sports cameras.

articles.title: Dorking Wanderers 3-1 Notts County - BBC
articles.description: James McShane scores a hat-trick to help Dorking defeat Notts County at Meadowbank.
articles.content:
James McShane scored a hat-trick to help Dorking defeat Notts County at Meadowbank and end the Magpies' unbeaten start to the National League season.
